title: COKI Research Impact Evaluation System

description:
An on-demand pilot system for calculating ERA-like benchmarks using open data and transparent analysis.

notes: The Curtin Open Knowledge Initiative (COKI) is a strategic initiative of the Research Office at Curtin, the Faculty of Humanities, School of Media, Creative Arts and Social Inquiry and the Curtin Institute for Computation.
